title: Baked New York cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '180g plain flour', '120g butter, room temperature', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', 'For the filling', '900g good quality full fat cream cheese', '300g caster sugar', '4 large eggs', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '100ml double cream', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
